channel.title: Hexo on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hexo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: [Hexo] Theme BeanTech
item.description: Ported Theme of Hux Blog, Thank Huxpro for designing such a flawless theme. This BeanTech theme created by YuHsuan modified from the original Porter Kaijun Live Demo Usage I publish the whole project for your convenience, so you can just follow the instruction down below, then you can easily customiz your own blog! Let’s begin!!! Init git clone https://github.com/YenYuHsuan/hexo-theme-beantech.git ./hexo-beantech cd hexo-beantech npm install Modify Modify _config.
